TextLines: type <color=red> /al </color>            - Auto-lock doors with a specific code
type <color=red> /backpack </color>      - Open your backpack storage
type <color=red> /backpackGUI </color>   - Toggle on/off the Backpack icon
type <color=red> /bank </color>          - Opens the central bank storage
type <color=red> /bgrade </color>        - Set the default Resource grade when building

type <color=red> /cctv </color>          - CCTV Security Camera tools
type <color=red> /chute </color>         - Parachute for landing soft from high places

type <color=red> /friend </color>        - Manage Friends list
type <color=red> /fs </color>            - Furnace stack splitter settings
type <color=red> /heal </color>          - Heal yourself
type <color=red> /healplayer </color>    - Heal another player
type <color=red> /home </color>          - Set your Home spawn points
type <color=red> /kit </color>           - Spawn item and loadout kits

type <color=red> /skin </color>          - Free Steam Workshop skins
type <color=red> /tpa </color>           - Accept a teleport request
